description:
Thank you to SideQuest for Sponsoring this video! They are giving a Quest 3 to a special someone in this community! Information here:

https://sidequestvr.com/app/10831/banter-public-beta?utm_source=thrill_24_02_2024

Hello and welcome to TUESD- I mean.. Saturday Newsday! Quest 3 and Pro just got some pretty awesome hand tracking upgrades that I have been eagerly anticipating, brain computer interfaces take another step towards becoming a "consumer product", PSVR 2 is receiving official PC support, new VR headsets! A LOT has happened! I hope you enjoy!

My discord:
https://discord.com/invite/thrill

Support my content:
https://www.patreon.com/Thrillseeker

TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Intro
00:57 Sidequest Ad
01:47 Brain Computer Interfaces
03:36 Wide Motion Mode
04:55 Concurrent Hands and Controllers (multimodal)
06:28 Quest UI overhaul
07:41 PSVR2 ON PC!
09:09 Valve Prism
10:23 Huawei Vision
11:02 Vi
12:21 Outro
title: Quest Hand Tracking Just Got A HUGE Upgrade
